Text: I'd like to see fault3 back as well!
Thanks. And i to wish that fault3 would make a glorious return. He upped some truly AMAZING stuff.

Yes, now we're all waiting here. Will fault3 be back as we wish ? Exiting, isn't it ? Fault3, just PM a good MOD in the forum, like WTC-SWE or HERO, it should work fine. Just read my instructions how to...

@fault3. Here's a list of available MOD's (in green color). Agricola is a good choice - he regularly posts Teens in the Porn category. (but forget velvetfog):

WHZ as you know the main reason Fault3 got banned was because he posted underage girls

https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=112770

https://forum.suprbay.org/showthread.php?tid=83511

@slowquin. Sure, i know the whole story. But believe me, MOD's are not monsters after all (at least not everyone). A nice gesture and some apologizing and he'll be back in no time. I had been banned once for posting Sandra Teen Model sets but then i contacted the very nice WTC-SWE and voila, i was back. But old torrents are of course gone for good. That's why i have written a text message to fault3 inside this torrent. That MOD contacting is only 1 way to come back, there's a 2nd way too which i tell him here (which will work 100% for sure)
@ WHZ  I'm sure he will be back. I don't care one way or the other as that's not my cup of tea. Take care and thanks for resizing as I don't have a proggie for that.

Just for the record: fault3 had posted probably about 50 torrents of which only about 2 were under 18yo (those CD-TV models). I'm naturally NOT asking him to post underage models anymore, no, never, we want him to upload all those 18 turned sweethearts like Diana Amber Cherry Tanya Danielle etc, as he did. They were all HOT really amazing.
fault3 - read my message to you on suprbay (crossof) - i also sent the same message to your email through my (DM) suprbay account. Please read and answer ASAP.
He can post all he wants as long as he keeps his damned name off the images.
